sentences.en: A problem occurred when the wizard attempted to create the quorum directory.
sentences.cn: 向导试图创建仲裁目录时发生错误.

sentences.en: A quorum for any meeting shall be two members.
sentences.cn: 每次会议之法定人数为两位成员.

sentences.en: Checking that all nodes have access to the quorum resource.
sentences.cn: 正在检查所有节点是否可以访问仲裁资源.

sentences.en: Failed the load string for locating existing quorum resource.
sentences.cn: 未能查找已有的仲裁资源时加载字符串.

sentences.en: Five members of the Executive Council shall constitute a quorum.
sentences.cn: 执行委员会法定成员为五人.

sentences.en: Objective : To understand the effects of quorum sensing system on P.
sentences.cn: 目的: 研究群体感应系统对铜绿假单胞菌生物膜形成的影响.

sentences.en: One - half of the countries members of the Assembly shall constitute a quorum.
sentences.cn: (b)大会成员国的半数构成开会的法定人数.

sentences.en: One - half of the members of the Executive Committee shall constitute a quorum.
sentences.cn: (b)执行委员会委员的半数构成开会的法定人数.

sentences.en: Quorum resource is not joinable. A multi - node cluster can not be created.
sentences.cn: 无法加入仲裁资源. 无法创建多节点群集.

sentences.en: Restore the Cluster Registry to the quorum disk and all other nodes.
sentences.cn: 将群集注册表还原到仲裁磁盘和所有其他节点.

sentences.en: Since a a quorum is not present, no votes may be taken.
sentences.cn: 既然不足法定人数, 可以不予表决.

sentences.en: The cluster quorum resource is not allowed to have any dependencies.
sentences.cn: 该群集仲裁资源不允许有任何依存关系.

sentences.en: The quorum disk could not be located by the cluster service.
sentences.cn: 群集服务找不到仲裁磁盘.

sentences.en: The quorum log could not be created or mounted successfully.
sentences.cn: 无法成功创建或装入仲裁日志.

sentences.en: We need a quorum of seven.
sentences.cn: 我们需要有七人的法定人数。

sentences.en: When restoring the Cluster Quorum, mark the restored data as Authoritative.
sentences.cn: 还原群集仲裁时, 将还原的数据标为“权威”.

trans.tran_en: the smallest number of people who must be present at a meeting so that official decisions can be made
